CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Tech Distribution relative to QuickDeliver Hubs?
SRP.A: Tech Distribution is {above} QuickDeliver Hubs in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing QuickDeliver Hubs relative to Cold Chain Facilities?
SRP.A: QuickDeliver Hubs is {below} Cold Chain Facilities in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Cold Chain Facilities relative to Tech Distribution?
SRP.A: Cold Chain Facilities is {below} Tech Distribution in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total inventory turnover?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Cold Chain Facilities}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total inventory turnover?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Tech Distribution}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Tech Distribution's minimum Inventory Turnover in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Tech Distribution's minimum Inventory Turnover is in {2013}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Bulk Goods Centers's maximum Inventory Turnover in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Bulk Goods Centers's maximum Inventory Turnover is in {2010}.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2006, was the average total Inventory Turnover higher or lower than between 2009 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total inventory turnover between 2004 and 2006 was {lower} than between 2009 and 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total Inventory Turnover in 2002 higher or lower than in 2009?
NC.A: The total inventory turnover in 2002 was {lower} than in 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2008, was the average total Inventory Turnover higher or lower than between 2001 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total inventory turnover between 2003 and 2008 was {higher} than between 2001 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2009, was the average total Inventory Turnover higher or lower than between 2002 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total inventory turnover between 1998 and 2009 was {lower} than between 2002 and 2009.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Cold Chain Facilities} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Tech Distribution and Cold Chain Facilities first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Tech Distribution and Cold Chain Facilities first exchanged leading positions in {1999}.
